goals.question: What is the trend of wounds over time?
goals.visualization: Line chart of wounds over date
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is an increase or decrease in the number of wounds over time.

goals.question: What is the distribution of other injuries?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the frequency and severity of other injuries.

goals.question: What is the correlation between wounds and other injuries?
goals.visualization: Scatter plot of wounds and other injuries
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand if there is a relationship between wounds and other injuries.

goals.question: What is the most common type of disease?
goals.rationale: This visualization will help us understand the frequency of different types of diseases.

goals.question: What is the total number of injuries?
goals.rationale: This will give us an overall understanding of the number of injuries in the dataset.

code:
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    data = data.dropna(subset=['date'])
    chart = sns.lineplot(x='date', y='wounds', data=data)
    chart.set_title('What is the trend of wounds over time?', wrap=True)
    return chart

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['other'] = pd.to_numeric(data['other'], errors='coerce')
    data = data.dropna(subset=['other'])
    sns.histplot(data=data, x='other', kde=True, color='blue')
    plt.axvline(data['other'].mean(), color='red', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=1, label='Mean')
    plt.legend()
    plt.title('What is the distribution of other injuries?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    sns.scatterplot(x='wounds', y='other', data=data)
    plt.title('What is the correlation between wounds and other injuries?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    data = data.dropna(subset=['date'])
    data = data.set_index('date')
    data = data.resample('M').sum()
    data = data.reset_index()
    data = data.melt(id_vars=['date'], var_name='disease', value_name='count')
    data = data.sort_values(by='count', ascending=False)
    sns.set(style="whitegrid")
    chart = sns.barplot(x='disease', y='count', data=data, palette='Blues_d')
    chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation=45, horizontalalignment='right')
    chart.axhline(y=data['count'].max(), color='r', linestyle='--', label='Max: {:.2f}'.format(data['count'].max()))
    chart.legend()
    return plt

chart = plot(data)

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
def plot(data: pd.DataFrame):
    data['date'] = pd.to_datetime(data['date'], format='%Y-%m-%d', errors='coerce')
    data = data.dropna(subset=['date'])
    data = data.sort_values(by='date')
    data['total_injuries'] = data['wounds'] + data['other'] + data['disease']
    ax = sns.lineplot(x='date', y='total_injuries', data=data)
    ax.axhline(y=data['total_injuries'].sum(), color='r', linestyle='--', label='Total Injuries: {:.2f}'.format(data['total_injuries'].sum()))
    plt.legend()
    plt.title('What is the total number of injuries?', wrap=True)
    return plt;

chart = plot(data)

    data = data.dropna(subset=['date'])
    data = data.set_index('date')
    data = data.resample('M').sum()
    data = data.reset_index()
    data = data.melt(id_vars=['date'], var_name='disease', value_name='count')
    data = data.sort_values(by='count', ascending=False)
